00044 const char CellStoreV0::DATA_BLOCK_MAGIC[10]           = { 'D','a','t','a','-','-','-','-','-','-' };
00045 const char CellStoreV0::INDEX_FIXED_BLOCK_MAGIC[10]    = { 'I','d','x','F','i','x','-','-','-','-' };
00046 const char CellStoreV0::INDEX_VARIABLE_BLOCK_MAGIC[10] = { 'I','d','x','V','a','r','-','-','-','-' };

00054 CellStoreV0::CellStoreV0(Filesystem *filesys) : m_filesys(filesys), m_filename(), m_fd(-1), m_index(),
00055   m_compressor(0), m_buffer(0), m_fix_index_buffer(0), m_var_index_buffer(0),
00056   m_outstanding_appends(0), m_offset(0), m_last_key(0), m_file_length(0), m_disk_usage(0), m_file_id(0), m_uncompressed_blocksize(0) {
00057   m_file_id = FileBlockCache::get_next_file_id();
00058   assert(sizeof(float) == 4);
00059 }

00063 CellStoreV0::~CellStoreV0() {
00064   try {
00065     delete m_compressor;
00066 
00067     if (m_fd != -1)
00068       m_filesys->close(m_fd);
00069   }
00070   catch (Exception &e) {
00071     HT_ERRORF("%s: error closing DFS client: %s", __func__, e.what());
00072   }

00101 int CellStoreV0::create(const char *fname, uint32_t blocksize, const std::string &compressor) {
00102   m_buffer.reserve(blocksize*4);
00103 
00104   m_fd = -1;
00105   m_offset = 0;
00106   m_last_key = 0;
00107   m_fix_index_buffer.reserve(blocksize);
00108   m_var_index_buffer.reserve(blocksize);
00109 
00110   m_uncompressed_data = 0.0;
00111   m_compressed_data = 0.0;
00112 
00113   m_trailer.clear();
00114   m_trailer.blocksize = blocksize;
00115   m_uncompressed_blocksize = blocksize;
00116 
00117   m_filename = fname;
00118 
00119   m_start_row = "";
00120   m_end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00121 
00122   if (compressor.empty())
00123     m_trailer.compression_type = CompressorFactory::parse_block_codec_spec(
00124                                   "lzo", m_compressor_args);
00125   else
00126     m_trailer.compression_type = CompressorFactory::parse_block_codec_spec(
00127                                   compressor, m_compressor_args);
00128 
00129   m_compressor = CompressorFactory::create_block_codec(
00130                   (BlockCompressionCodec::Type)m_trailer.compression_type,
00131                   m_compressor_args);
00132 
00133   try { m_fd = m_filesys->create(m_filename, true, -1, -1, -1); }
00134   catch (Exception &e) {
00135     HT_ERRORF("Error creating cellstore: %s", e.what());
00136     return e.code();
00137   }
00138   return Error::OK;
00139 }

00142 int CellStoreV0::add(const ByteString key, const ByteString value, uint64_t real_timestamp) {
00143   EventPtr eventPtr;
00144   DynamicBuffer zBuffer;
00145 
00146   (void)real_timestamp;
00147 
00148   if (m_buffer.fill() > m_uncompressed_blocksize) {
00149     BlockCompressionHeader header(DATA_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00150 
00151     add_index_entry(m_last_key, m_offset);
00152 
00153     m_uncompressed_data += (float)m_buffer.fill();
00154     m_compressor->deflate(m_buffer, zBuffer, header);
00155     m_compressed_data += (float)zBuffer.fill();
00156     m_buffer.clear();
00157 
00158     uint64_t llval = ((uint64_t)m_trailer.blocksize * (uint64_t)m_uncompressed_data) / (uint64_t)m_compressed_data;
00159     m_uncompressed_blocksize = (uint32_t)llval;
00160 
00161     if (m_outstanding_appends >= MAX_APPENDS_OUTSTANDING) {
00162       if (!m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr)) {
00163         HT_ERRORF("Problem writing to DFS file '%s' : %s", m_filename.c_str(), Hypertable::Protocol::string_format_message(eventPtr).c_str());
00164         return -1;
00165       }
00166       m_outstanding_appends--;
00167     }
00168 
00169     size_t zlen = zBuffer.fill();
00170     StaticBuffer send_buf(zBuffer);
00171 
00172     try { m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler); }
00173     catch (Exception &e) {
00174       HT_ERRORF("Problem writing to DFS file '%s' : %s",
00175                 m_filename.c_str(), e.what());
00176       return -1;
00177     }
00178     m_outstanding_appends++;
00179     m_offset += zlen;
00180   }
00181 
00182   size_t keyLen = key.length();
00183   size_t valueLen = value.length();
00184 
00185   m_buffer.ensure( keyLen + valueLen );
00186 
00187   m_last_key.ptr = m_buffer.addNoCheck(key.ptr, keyLen);
00188   m_buffer.addNoCheck(value.ptr, valueLen);
00189 
00190   m_trailer.total_entries++;
00191 
00192   return 0;
00193 }

00197 int CellStoreV0::finalize(Timestamp &timestamp) {
00198   EventPtr eventPtr;
00199   int error = -1;
00200   size_t zlen;
00201   DynamicBuffer zBuffer(0);
00202   size_t len;
00203   uint8_t *base;
00204   ByteString key;
00205   StaticBuffer send_buf;
00206 
00207   if (m_buffer.fill() > 0) {
00208     BlockCompressionHeader header(DATA_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00209 
00210     add_index_entry(m_last_key, m_offset);
00211 
00212     m_uncompressed_data += (float)m_buffer.fill();
00213     m_compressor->deflate(m_buffer, zBuffer, header);
00214     m_compressed_data += (float)zBuffer.fill();
00215 
00216     zlen = zBuffer.fill();
00217     send_buf = zBuffer;
00218 
00219     if (m_outstanding_appends >= MAX_APPENDS_OUTSTANDING) {
00220       if (!m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr)) {
00221         HT_ERRORF("Problem writing to DFS file '%s' : %s", m_filename.c_str(), Protocol::string_format_message(eventPtr).c_str());
00222         goto abort;
00223       }
00224       m_outstanding_appends--;
00225     }
00226 
00227     try { m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler); }
00228     catch (Exception &e) {
00229       HT_ERRORF("Problem writing to DFS file '%s' : %s", m_filename.c_str(),
00230                 e.what());
00231       goto abort;
00232     }
00233     m_outstanding_appends++;
00234     m_offset += zlen;
00235   }
00236 
00237   m_trailer.fix_index_offset = m_offset;
00238   m_trailer.timestamp = timestamp;
00239   m_trailer.compression_ratio = m_compressed_data / m_uncompressed_data;
00240   m_trailer.version = 0;
00241 
00245   base = m_fix_index_buffer.release(&len);
00246   m_fix_index_buffer.reserve(len);
00247   m_fix_index_buffer.addNoCheck(base, len);
00248   delete [] base;
00249   base = m_var_index_buffer.release(&len);
00250   m_var_index_buffer.reserve(len);
00251   m_var_index_buffer.addNoCheck(base, len);
00252   delete [] base;
00253 
00257   {
00258     BlockCompressionHeader header(INDEX_FIXED_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00259     m_compressor->deflate(m_fix_index_buffer, zBuffer, header);
00260   }
00261 
00262   zlen = zBuffer.fill();
00263   send_buf = zBuffer;
00264 
00265   try { m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler); }
00266   catch (Exception &e) {
00267     HT_ERRORF("%s: %s", __func__, e.what());
00268     goto abort;
00269   }
00270   m_outstanding_appends++;
00271   m_offset += zlen;
00272 
00276   {
00277     BlockCompressionHeader header(INDEX_VARIABLE_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00278     m_trailer.var_index_offset = m_offset;
00279     m_compressor->deflate(m_var_index_buffer, zBuffer, header, m_trailer.size());
00280   }
00281 
00285   uint32_t offset;
00286   m_fix_index_buffer.ptr = m_fix_index_buffer.base;
00287   m_var_index_buffer.ptr = m_var_index_buffer.base;
00288   for (size_t i=0; i<m_trailer.index_entries; i++) {
00289     // variable portion
00290     key.ptr = m_var_index_buffer.ptr;
00291     m_var_index_buffer.ptr += key.length();
00292     // fixed portion (e.g. offset)
00293     memcpy(&offset, m_fix_index_buffer.ptr, sizeof(offset));
00294     m_fix_index_buffer.ptr += sizeof(offset);
00295     m_index.insert(m_index.end(), IndexMapT::value_type(key, offset));
00296     if (i == m_trailer.index_entries/2) {
00297       record_split_row(ByteString(m_var_index_buffer.ptr));
00298     }
00299   }
00300 
00301   // deallocate fix index data
00302   delete [] m_fix_index_buffer.release();
00303 
00304   // write filter_offset (empty for now)
00305   m_trailer.filter_offset = m_offset + zBuffer.fill();
00306 
00307   // 
00308   m_trailer.serialize(zBuffer.ptr);
00309   zBuffer.ptr += m_trailer.size();
00310 
00311   zlen = zBuffer.fill();
00312   send_buf = zBuffer;
00313 
00314   try { m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf); }
00315   catch (Exception &e) {
00316     HT_ERRORF("%s: %s", __func__, e.what());
00317     goto abort;
00318   }
00319   m_outstanding_appends++;
00320   m_offset += zlen;
00321 
00323   try { m_filesys->close(m_fd); }
00324   catch (Exception &e) {
00325     HT_ERRORF("%s: %s", __func__, e.what());
00326     goto abort;
00327   }
00328 
00330   m_file_length = m_offset;
00331 
00333   try { m_fd = m_filesys->open(m_filename); }
00334   catch (Exception &e) {
00335     HT_ERRORF("%s: Error reopening cellstore: %s", __func__, e.what());
00336     goto abort;
00337   }
00338 
00339   m_disk_usage = (uint32_t)m_file_length;
00340   error = 0;
00341 
00342  abort:
00343   delete m_compressor;
00344   m_compressor = 0;
00345 
00346   return error;
00347 }

00350 
00354 void CellStoreV0::add_index_entry(const ByteString key, uint32_t offset) {
00355 
00356   size_t keyLen = key.length();
00357   m_var_index_buffer.ensure( keyLen );
00358   memcpy(m_var_index_buffer.ptr, key.ptr, keyLen);
00359   m_var_index_buffer.ptr += keyLen;
00360 
00361   // Serialize offset into fix index buffer
00362   m_fix_index_buffer.ensure(sizeof(offset));
00363   memcpy(m_fix_index_buffer.ptr, &offset, sizeof(offset));
00364   m_fix_index_buffer.ptr += sizeof(offset);
00365 
00366   m_trailer.index_entries++;
00367 }

00374 int CellStoreV0::open(const char *fname, const char *start_row, const char *end_row) {
00375   m_start_row = (start_row) ? start_row : "";
00376   m_end_row = (end_row) ? end_row : Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00377 
00378   m_fd = -1;
00379 
00380   m_filename = fname;
00381 
00383   try { m_file_length = m_filesys->length(m_filename); }
00384   catch (Exception &e) {
00385     HT_ERRORF("%s: %s", __func__, e.what());
00386     goto abort;
00387   }
00388 
00389   if (m_file_length < m_trailer.size()) {
00390     HT_ERRORF("Bad length of CellStore file '%s' - %lld", m_filename.c_str(),
00391               m_file_length);
00392     goto abort;
00393   }
00394 
00396   try { m_fd =  m_filesys->open(m_filename); }
00397   catch (Exception &e) {
00398     HT_ERRORF("%s: %s", __func__, e.what());
00399     goto abort;
00400   }
00401 
00405   {
00406     uint32_t len;
00407     uint8_t *trailer_buf = new uint8_t [ m_trailer.size() ];
00408 
00409     try {
00410       len = m_filesys->pread(m_fd, trailer_buf, m_trailer.size(),
00411                              m_file_length - m_trailer.size());
00412     }
00413     catch (Exception &e) {
00414       HT_ERRORF("Problem reading trailer for CellStore '%s': %s",
00415                 m_filename.c_str(), e.what());
00416       delete [] trailer_buf;
00417       goto abort;
00418     }
00419 
00420     if (len != m_trailer.size()) {
00421       HT_ERRORF("Problem reading trailer for CellStore file '%s' - only read "
00422                 "%d of %d bytes", m_filename.c_str(), len, m_trailer.size());
00423       delete [] trailer_buf;
00424       goto abort;
00425     }
00426 
00427     m_trailer.deserialize(trailer_buf);
00428     delete [] trailer_buf;
00429   }
00430 
00432   if (m_trailer.version != 0) {
00433     HT_ERRORF("Unsupported CellStore version (%d) for file '%s'",
00434               m_trailer.version, fname);
00435     goto abort;
00436   }
00437   if (!(m_trailer.fix_index_offset < m_trailer.var_index_offset &&
00438         m_trailer.var_index_offset < m_file_length)) {
00439     HT_ERRORF("Bad index offsets in CellStore trailer fix=%lld, var=%lld, "
00440               "length=%lld, file='%s'", m_trailer.fix_index_offset,
00441               m_trailer.var_index_offset, m_file_length, fname);
00442     goto abort;
00443   }
00444 
00445   return Error::OK;
00446 
00447  abort:
00448   return Error::LOCAL_IO_ERROR;
00449 }

00451 
00452 int CellStoreV0::load_index() {
00453   int error = -1;
00454   uint8_t *buf = 0;
00455   uint32_t amount;
00456   uint8_t *vbuf = 0;
00457   uint8_t *fEnd;
00458   uint8_t *vEnd;
00459   uint32_t len;
00460   BlockCompressionHeader header;
00461   DynamicBuffer input(0);
00462   ByteString key;
00463 
00464   m_compressor = create_block_compression_codec();
00465 
00466   amount = (m_file_length-m_trailer.size()) - m_trailer.fix_index_offset;
00467   buf = new uint8_t [ amount ];
00468 
00470   try {
00471     len = m_filesys->pread(m_fd, buf, amount, m_trailer.fix_index_offset);
00472   }
00473   catch (Exception &e) {
00474     HT_ERRORF("Error reading trailer for cellstore '%s': %s",
00475               m_filename.c_str(), e.what());
00476     goto abort;
00477   }
00478 
00479   if (len != amount) {
00480     HT_ERRORF("Problem loading index for CellStore '%s' : tried to read %d "
00481               "but only got %d", m_filename.c_str(), amount, len);
00482     goto abort;
00483   }
00484 
00486   {
00487     input.base = buf;
00488     input.ptr = buf + (m_trailer.var_index_offset - m_trailer.fix_index_offset);
00489     if ((error = m_compressor->inflate(input, m_fix_index_buffer, header)) != Error::OK) {
00490       HT_ERRORF("Fixed index decompression error - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00491       goto abort;
00492     }
00493     if (!header.check_magic(INDEX_FIXED_BLOCK_MAGIC)) {
00494       error = Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_MAGIC;
00495       goto abort;
00496     }
00497   }
00498 
00499   vbuf = buf + (m_trailer.var_index_offset-m_trailer.fix_index_offset);
00500   amount = (m_file_length-m_trailer.size()) - m_trailer.var_index_offset;
00501 
00503   {
00504     input.base = vbuf;
00505     input.ptr = vbuf + amount;
00506     if ((error = m_compressor->inflate(input, m_var_index_buffer, header)) != Error::OK) {
00507       HT_ERRORF("Variable index decompression error - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00508       goto abort;
00509     }
00510     if (!header.check_magic(INDEX_VARIABLE_BLOCK_MAGIC)) {
00511       error = Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_MAGIC;
00512       goto abort;
00513     }
00514   }
00515 
00516   m_index.clear();
00517 
00518   uint32_t offset;
00519 
00520   // record end offsets for sanity checking and reset ptr
00521   fEnd = m_fix_index_buffer.ptr;
00522   m_fix_index_buffer.ptr = m_fix_index_buffer.base;
00523   vEnd = m_var_index_buffer.ptr;
00524   m_var_index_buffer.ptr = m_var_index_buffer.base;
00525 
00526   for (size_t i=0; i< m_trailer.index_entries; i++) {
00527 
00528     assert(m_fix_index_buffer.ptr < fEnd);
00529     assert(m_var_index_buffer.ptr < vEnd);
00530 
00531     // Deserialized cell key (variable portion)
00532     key.ptr = m_var_index_buffer.ptr;
00533     m_var_index_buffer.ptr += key.length();
00534 
00535     // Deserialize offset
00536     memcpy(&offset, m_fix_index_buffer.ptr, sizeof(offset));
00537     m_fix_index_buffer.ptr += sizeof(offset);
00538 
00539     m_index.insert(m_index.end(), IndexMapT::value_type(key, offset));
00540 
00541   }
00542 
00546   {
00547     uint32_t start = 0;
00548     uint32_t end = (uint32_t)m_file_length;
00549     size_t start_row_length = m_start_row.length() + 1;
00550     size_t end_row_length = m_end_row.length() + 1;
00551     DynamicBuffer dbuf( 7 + std::max(start_row_length, end_row_length) );
00552     ByteString bs;
00553     CellStoreV0::IndexMapT::const_iterator iter, mid_iter, end_iter;
00554 
00555     dbuf.clear();
00556     append_as_byte_string(dbuf, m_start_row.c_str(), start_row_length);
00557     bs.ptr = dbuf.base;
00558     iter = m_index.upper_bound(bs);
00559     start = (*iter).second;
00560 
00561     dbuf.clear();
00562     append_as_byte_string(dbuf, m_end_row.c_str(), end_row_length);
00563     bs.ptr = dbuf.base;
00564     if ((end_iter = m_index.lower_bound(bs)) == m_index.end())
00565       end = m_file_length;
00566     else
00567       end = (*iter).second;
00568 
00569     m_disk_usage = end - start;
00570 
00571     size_t i=0;
00572     for (mid_iter=iter; iter!=end_iter; ++iter,++i) {
00573       if ((i%2)==0)
00574         ++mid_iter;
00575     }
00576     if (mid_iter != m_index.end())
00577       record_split_row((*mid_iter).first);
00578 
00579   }
00580 
00581   error = 0;
00582 
00583  abort:
00584   input.base = 0;
00585   delete m_compressor;
00586   m_compressor = 0;
00587   delete [] m_fix_index_buffer.release();
00588   delete [] buf;
00589   return error;
00590 }
00591 
00592 
00596 void CellStoreV0::display_block_info() {
00597   ByteString last_key;
00598   uint32_t last_offset = 0;
00599   uint32_t block_size;
00600   size_t i=0;
00601   for (IndexMapT::const_iterator iter = m_index.begin(); iter != m_index.end(); iter++) {
00602     if (last_key) {
00603       block_size = (*iter).second - last_offset;
00604       cout << i << ": offset=" << last_offset << " size=" << block_size << " row=" << last_key.str() << endl;
00605       i++;
00606     }
00607     last_offset = (*iter).second;
00608     last_key = (*iter).first;
00609   }
00610   if (last_key) {
00611     block_size = m_trailer.filter_offset - last_offset;
00612     cout << i << ": offset=" << last_offset << " size=" << block_size << " row=" << last_key.str() << endl;
00613   }
00614 }

00617 
00618 void CellStoreV0::record_split_row(const ByteString key) {
00619   uint8_t *ptr;
00620   key.decode_length(&ptr);
00621   std::string split_row = (const char *)ptr;
00622   if (split_row > m_start_row && split_row < m_end_row)
00623     m_split_row = split_row;
00624   //cout << "record_split_row = " << m_split_row << endl;
00625 }
